entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @HillaryClinton There are ONLY 59 confirmed cases of Coronavirus in the US! Hardly an outbreak by logical thinking people. The damn Democrats are fearmongering, blaming this on Trump when he ordered our borders closed when the dems wanted them flung open. Don't believe dems lies.
